data.name: Minotaur Princess
data.detailed_description:
Think you have what it takes to walk a mile in a minotaur's heels?
Minotaur Princess is the story of Atrea, a once beautiful princess who gets body swapped with a minotaur and exiled to a far away land. Now she must embark on a journey to find herself (literally) and reclaim her homeland. Earn new items and abilities to customize your moveset before combat and prepare yourself against a myriad of foes all with different strengths and abilities of their own. If you’re a fan of RPGs, puzzle fighters, or exiled princesses trapped in a minotaur's body, then you're in the right place!


"I've seen dumber sh*t gain traction on Steam"
- Thomas Wilde, GeekWire Journalist

"I wanted to make a game that felt like Final Fantasy and Puzzle Quest had an illegitimate love child together"
- Charles Kimball, Producer


Intense Combat
👺 The combination of turn based attack planning and real time combat gives you time to plan your attack while making you react to combat situations in real time.
👺 Utilize 100+ different attacks and abilities to conquer your foes.
👺 Meet over a 100 unique characters, some will be friends, most will be foes.
👺 Explore the 7 realms of Urasha, each with their own subculture and bringing their own challenges to your goal of reuniting...with yourself.
👺 Control your fate in combat: Skill matters. The difference between a poorly and perfectly executed fire spell is the difference between invoking a small flame and summoning a devastating meteor from the heavens.
👺 Summon familiars to fight by your side, pray to your deity to grant you strength, throw snowballs (with rocks) at your enemies, beat them to a pulp with your hammer. With dozens of different abilities you can create your own personal combat style.
👺 Each ability has four tiers of with varying degrees of power depending on your skill

Competitive Multiplayer
👹⚔🧙‍♀️ Play against friends in VS mode.
👹⚔🧙‍♀️ Choose between over a dozen characters each with their own move sets.
👹⚔🧙‍♀️Three different VS modes of combat allow for a multitude of ways to beat the crap out of your friends!

Bad-ass sound track
🎵 Do you have ears? Show them some love and treat them to the beautiful and oft intense sounds of the seven realms of Akrotheria.

data.short_description: Rescue the Princess? You ARE the princess! Defeat the minotaur? You ARE the minotaur! Embark on the journey of a princess who gets body swapped with a minotaur. A puzzle fighter RPG where your wits and cunning will be put to the test in a combination of turn based and real-time gameplay.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 8th Gen or comparable AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or comparable Radeon card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10th Gen or comparable AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or comparable Radeon card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
